bibl.title: 'Annona militaris' and 'Rizk' of Nessana.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III
bibl.author: El Abbadi, Mostafa

bibl.note: The 'rizk' was an Arab continuation of the Byzantine annona militaris as well as equal to it in amount.
El Abbadi Mostafa, 'Annona militaris' and 'Rizk' of Nessana.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III (Napoli, 1984) pp. 1057-1062.
